scripts.build:extension: cd apps/extension && bun run build && bun run package
scripts.release:patch: cd apps/extension && npm version patch && cd ../.. && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump extension version" && git push
scripts.release:minor: cd apps/extension && npm version minor && cd ../.. && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump extension version" && git push
scripts.release:major: cd apps/extension && npm version major && cd ../.. && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump extension version" && git push
